text: Loved the experience, very professional. I highly recommend her 100%.
author: Amhimmid Ahfaaf

text: I've been attending the clinic for Lemon Bottle injections with Dr Maysem, and I've seen a huge difference already. From start to finish, the treatment has been exceptional — pre-treatment, during, and aftercare have all been handled with great care.
author: Sanjida Akther

text: I've visited Maysem twice now and I honestly couldn't be happier with my results. She is incredibly knowledgeable, gentle and genuinely cares about your skin and your comfort.
author: Marcia Lombardi

text: I had such a fantastic experience with Maysem at Aesthetic Pharmacist. From the moment I arrived, she made me feel so comfortable and at ease with her warm and professional approach. Maysem is incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to explain everything.
author: Fatimaezzahra Bouraouda

text: I recently had a microneedling with exosomes treatment on my face with Maysem and honestly I was a bit scared at first but it went amazing!
author: Noomane Mrf

text: I highly recommend Maysem's services based on her vast experience and honest approach. The treatments that I've had done by Maysem were performed with deft and skill. I appreciate her honesty when it came to what treatments are best for my skin.
author: Baneen Salem

text: Maysem is so lovely! She did my micro needling treatment today and even bought me a latte, how cute! The procedure was painless, as she applied numbing cream to my face. I also had red light therapy, I'm super excited to see the final results!
author: Natalie Good

text: I had lip and chin fillers, botox, salmon DNA skin booster with Maysem, and she made the whole experience so comfortable. She's gentle, sweet, and really professional, explaining everything and answering all my questions.
author: marilena_p

text: Incredibly smooth service, exceptionally kind, honest and considerate practitioner and nurse. This is someone who will speak to you sincerely and not guide or support you with treatments or aesthetics if she truly doesn't see your need for it. Highly recommend!!
author: Zara Sadia

text: Maisam made me feel incredibly comfortable throughout the whole process and talked me through everything. I had polynucleotides under my eyes and my cheeks, and chin/jaw augmentation to try and hide my double chin. Maisam understood my skin concerns perfectly.
author: Kate Loader

text: I had the absolute pleasure of being treated by Maysem and can't recommend her enough! I came in for a polynucleotide under eye treatment, skin booster, and microneedling, and she made the whole experience exceptional. She explained everything clearly and made me feel at ease.
author: ATHMAN RAGAD

text: I had a 5 star experience with Dr. Maysem. I had Botox injections in my trapezius muscles which have been tense and painful for a long time and were giving me strong headaches. She made me feel comfortable and the results have been amazing.
author: V U

text: I recently had Profhilo and Microneedling treatments with Maysam and I couldn't be happier with the experience. She was very professional, gentle, and attentive throughout the whole process, making me feel completely comfortable. The results exceeded my expectations.
author: Rafaella Erotokritou

text: So sweet and kind!! Made me feel comfortable and safe, I genuinely would not trust anyone w my face but dr maysem is very good at what she does and I was so happy with the results!!
author: Lily

text: I recently visited this wonderful clinic for a skin booster treatment, and I couldn't be happier with the results! The treatment was excellent and professional.
author: Farah F

text: I had an amazing experience with Dr. Maysem. She really took the time to listen to my skin concerns and explained every step of the treatment. Highly recommend! Friendly and professional.
author: Rafla Saadaoui

text: I went for the first course of 3 microneedling sessions and it's been a pleasure. The treatment was excellent and I'm very happy with the results.
author: Kevin

text: Dr. Maysem is incredible! I had Botox, cheek fillers, and under-eye (salmon) filler, and the results are so natural. She has an amazing eye for detail and made me feel completely comfortable and was painless. The results are exactly what I wanted. Highly recommend her!!
author: mahfaf shibanyothman

text: I recently had a session with Maysem, and I couldn't be happier with my experience! Initially, I was quite nervous about the idea of getting injectables, particularly with something as unique as salmon sperm combined with Botox. But Maysem made me feel completely at ease.
author: Gallal Muflahi

text: I had a wonderful experience with Maysem and had polynucleotides booster on my face. It all was very painfree and I had minimal downtime and the next morning was back to normal. My skin looks amazing and my redness is gone.
author: Gabriela Adores

text: I had an amazing experience with Dr. Maysem for my Botox treatment! She was incredibly professional, explained everything clearly, and made me feel completely at ease. The results were subtle yet effective — just what I wanted. I feel so much more confident now. Highly recommend her to anyone considering Botox!
author: Tabassum Bashir

text: Dr. Maysem is amazing! I did lip fillers, botox and lemon bottle and the results are great!
author: Nia Iliev

text: The service provided was excellent. Maysem was very careful and gentle with the procedures, I was very happy with the results, and I definitely plan to come back, already have my next appointments booked. Highly recommend!
author: Thea Frangou

text: The staff are very welcoming and the treatment was excellent. The practitioner was nice explaining every process and took the up most care throughout every step of the procedure. Really good service and atmosphere.
author: Adz TNS

text: Maysem made me feel at ease and counselled me throughout the treatments. I am looking forward to further results. Maysem is very responsive to messages and always happy to help. Thank you!
author: Karan Trivedi

text: Maysem gave me an amazing experience. I've finally met someone I can truly trust with my skin—she's such a great specialist. Thank you!
author: Beg Olgaç

text: One of the most amazing skin treatments I ever had, skin booster gave an amazing glow and hydration to my skin. Thank you so much! Highly recommend this incredible beautician!
author: Audrone Gedrimaite

text: She was recommended to me by a friend, and honestly no regrets, I didn't feel any pain even though I have very high pain tolerance, I'd definitely be a loyal customer to her and would 100% recommend to a friend.
author: Helena Ioannidou

text: Thank you so much for giving the best glow for this summer, I am so glad that I chose you to have this incredible treatment, I can't stop looking at myself in the mirror!
author: areej shabaa

text: It's a good experience. I got eyes skin booster, and the effect was good.
author: 王一荣

text: Was happy to visit the clinic, really like the procedure!
author: Таня А

text: I love the results of my tear trough filler. Thank you
author: Beau Paley

text: Maisem is so lovely and has kindly advised me much during my process of polynucleotides. She listens to all my other skincare concerns whilst being realistic about what I need/don't need. She is great and I always look forward to my appointments with her!
author: Sadia A

text: I did microneedling with Dr. Maisam, and thank God her work was perfect and professional. It won't be the first time, God willing. The clinic's reception is also wonderful, and they are careful with time. Thank you very much!
author: Saad Aldossary

text: I had an excellent experience at Maysem London. I had wrinkle removal surgery here last month, and I was extremely satisfied with the results.
author: Shawn Huang
